title: Trumpâ€™s New Yearâ€™s Resolution Is To Keep A Central Campaign Promise
text:
SYLVESTER STALLONE (aka "Rocky") GAVE THIS TO #PresidentTrump LAST NIGHT. 
Says it allâ€¦ HAPPY NEW YEAR ! pic.twitter.com/ulJLsQoL0e

The message was written on top of an article about the ad below that drew on the words of Rocky Balboa about not making excuses, but taking the hits life gives and keep moving forward. 
Trump boldly proclaims in the ad: â€œWe are going to make America great again!â€ 
Trump promised at his party that he would be back to work on Monday, noting his incoming administration is â€œpicking a lot of great people for our government.â€ 
As reported by Western Journalism , Vice President-elect Mike Pence told Congress to â€œbuckle upâ€ and get ready for a very vigorous launch of the Trump administration. 
Pence stated, â€œRight out of the box, you are going to see our president-elect get out that pen and repeal every single unconstitutional executive order that Barack Obama signed into law.â€ 
Other items on the agenda include repealing Obamacare, passing tax reform, rolling back red tape, replacing Justice Antonin Scalia on the Supreme Court, and restoring the nationâ€™s military might. 
The vice president-elect believes the American people have given Trump a mandate to change the nationâ€™s course and make it great again. 
He said that Trump won â€œ30 of 50 states, more counties won than [any Republican candidate] since Ronald Reagan. This is an historic victory.â€ What do you think? Scroll down to comment below. Advertisement Popular Right Now
